TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CreateUserWizardStepCollectionEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionEditor

Docs.summary: Provides an editor in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](../../add/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] to edit the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> object of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> Web server control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Type"> of the items in the collection associated with the collection editor.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStepCollectionEditor"> class using the given <xref:System.Type>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool CanRemoveInstance(object value) cil managed

Docs.param: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> object to determine whether it can be removed from the collection.
Docs.summary: Returns a value indicating whether a provided object can be removed from the collection.
Docs.returns: `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> can be removed from the collection; otherwise, `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor/CollectionForm CreateCollectionForm() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modal dialog box for editing the contents of a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> objects.
Gets the `Help` keyword used to display the Help topic or topic list when users click the **Help** button or press the F1 key in the editor's dialog box.
Docs.value: The `Help` keyword to display the Help topic or topic list when Help is requested from the editor.
